Activity: Log in to the OA system, check emails. Update the team on the progress of prototype revisions.
Schedule a follow-up peer review meeting with the same group for revised prototypes feedback.
Conduct a follow-up peer review with the team, gathering additional insights on the revised prototypes.
Compile final feedback from the follow-up review and identify last iteration changes needed.
Finalize and document the prototypes, detailing core mechanics and interactions.
Wrap up the week by preparing a summary report of the prototypes and mechanics developed, to share with the team next week.
